articles.title: The world's top smartphone market has a new number one brand - PhoneArena
articles.description: Oppo has replaced Huawei as the most popular brand in China during January with a 21% share of the market. Vivo was second followed by a three-way tie between Huawei, Apple, and Xiaomi.
